The fact that businesses need to board up solely in anticipation of leftist outrage proves all you need to know about the state of Portland. However, one bookstore owner claims she is not worried, as she believes the left would never go after their own.

Woke bookstore owner supports rioters in Portland as businesses board up windows to brace for potential election violencehttps://t.co/19HfDbiF89
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial)
title: Portland businesses boarding up anticipating election violence, yet one store owner SUPPORTS rioting

The Dodgers won the World Series last week and low-IQ Angelinos did what only low-IQ Angelinos would do, which is destroy their city for reasons they cannot explain. However, one guy attempted to celebrate with fireworks and blew up his hand.

NEW: Dodgers fan blows off part of his hand with a firework while celebrating the Dodgers' World Series win over the Yankees.

The 25-year-old male was in downtown LA when the incident occurred.

title: Watch: This Dude Blew Off His Hand Celebrating The Dodgers Winning the World Series
